estudio.title: STUDIO
estudio.bioName: Gonzalo Ruiz de la Prada Font de Mora
estudio.bioP1: is an architect with a broad and diverse career, combining more than twenty-five years of professional practice with intense participation in national and international projects of very different scales.
estudio.bioP2: His profile is characterized by solid technical training, a clear vocation for architectural and urban design, and a proven ability to coordinate teams and manage projects with thousands of square meters built.
estudio.bioP3: Throughout his professional life he has accumulated more than 800 certified works at the Official College of Architects of the Valencian Community.
estudio.bioP4: He currently directs his own studio, Ruiz de la Prada Architects, where he has consolidated a strong specialization in high-standing buildings.
